description: Manage packet capture on a virtual network gateway.

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway packet-capture start
commands.summary: Start packet capture on a virtual network gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet-gateway packet-capture start [--filter]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--name]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
examples: az network vnet-gateway packet-capture start -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVnetGateway

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway packet-capture stop
commands.summary: Stop packet capture on a virtual network gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet-gateway packet-capture stop [--ids]
                                            [--name]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--sas-url]
                                            [--subscription]
examples: az network vnet-gateway packet-capture stop -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVnetGateway --sas-url https://myStorageAct.blob.azure.com/artifacts?st=2019-04-10T22%3A12Z&se=2019-04-11T09%3A12Z&sp=rl&sv=2018-03-28&sr=c&sig=0000000000

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway packet-capture wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
